Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep36
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Buruh Perkebunan Yang Sukses Berternak Lebah Madu
programme.desc: Sekar kecewa dengan bapanya dan terpaksa membantu ibunya mencari rezeki untuk menampung kehidupan. Sekar menghadapi dugaan demi ujian dengan penuh kesabaran sehingga dia dan ibunya berjaya menternak madu untuk kelangsungan hidup mereka.

programme.title: Cinta Misteri Ep18
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep20
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep61
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Buruh Perkebunan Yang Sukses Berternak Lebah Madu
programme.desc: Sekar kecewa dengan bapanya dan terpaksa membantu ibunya mencari rezeki untuk menampung kehidupan. Sekar menghadapi dugaan demi ujian dengan penuh kesabaran sehingga dia dan ibunya berjaya menternak madu untuk kelangsungan hidup mereka.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep36
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Pop Academy Ep44
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: Cinta Misteri Ep19
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep21
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep73
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Buah Kesabaran Tukang Lotek Menghadapi Anak Angkat Durhaka
programme.desc: Elsa ialah anak kepada penjual kereta sorong "Lotek". Walaupun Elsa adalah anak angkat kepada Pak Rohim dan Ibu Sari, mereka menyayanginya seperti anak sendiri. Mereka juga berharap Elsa akan meneruskan pendidikannya, tetapi dia memilih untuk berkahwin selepas tamat sekolah.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep62
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Jejak Misteri Ep7
programme.desc: Jejak Misteri ialah sebuah rancangan realiti bergenre misteri di mana setiap episod menyajikan liputan pelbagai tempat, bangunan dan tapak bersejarah yang bukan sahaja menyimpan kisah-kisah bersejarah, malah turut meninggalkan kisah-kisah mistik.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve at an ultra-luxurious building complex, a White Christmas party is held to dazzle its equally high-end tenants and VIP guests. It takes a horrific turn when a fire breaks out.

programme.title: Sinkhole
programme.desc: As the family celebrates their purchases of a new condo after 11 years of effort, the building was engulfed in a sinkhole due to heavy downpour.

programme.title: Mal-Mo-E: The Secret Mission
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation in the 1940s, two men work together to secretly create a dictionary of the Korean language when the language was banned.

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husband’s funeral.

programme.title: Steal My Heart
programme.desc: Hot-shot police detective Lee is out to get a hit-and-run driver and discovers the driver is his long-lost girlfriend from ten years ago. He tries to protect her before her crime record accumulates.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: Soar Into The Sun
programme.desc: An elite combat pilot carries a rescue mission to his missing teammate while facing threats from the north.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil'S Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Underground Rendezvous
programme.desc: A series of disasters in the big city bring an aspiring teacher to a small town where he falls in love with a girl whose origins are mysterious.

programme.title: The Foul King
programme.desc: A timid bank clerk discovers his talent as a wrestler by ways of cheating that no one had thought of. Yet frustrated to win solely by tricks, he decided to master moves in becoming a real wrestler.

programme.title: Beautiful Vampire
programme.desc: A beautiful 500-year-old vampire has her carefully constructed quiet life put in jeopardy when she becomes attracted to her landlady's doltish son.

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming he's sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: The Odd Family: Zombie On Sale
programme.desc: When a pharmaceutical company's illegal experiments inadvertently create a zombie, the quirky Park family discovers an interesting side effect to the virus and tries to profit from it.

programme.title: Deliver Us From Evil
programme.desc: A retired contract killer investigates a kidnapping case which may involve his next of kin, all the while relentlessly chased by his last target’s blood brother.

programme.title: Very Ordinary Couple
programme.desc: A couple working in the same bank broke up but continue to see each other in workplace. They couldn't help but pay attention to each other even more than they were dating...

programme.title: Inseparable Bros
programme.desc: Though not biologically related, two disabled men form a sibling-like relationship after spending 20 years together.

programme.title: Stellar: A Magical Ride
programme.desc: Chasing after a supercar in his father's beat-up Stellar, while being come after by local gangsters, Young Bae jog memories of his father bit by bit.

programme.title: Architecture 101
programme.desc: An architect gets an unexpected visit by his first love whom he hasn't seen in many years, bringing back memories from when they first met 15 years ago.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve at an ultra-luxurious building complex, a White Christmas party is held to dazzle its equally high-end tenants and VIP guests. It takes a horrific turn when a fire breaks out.

programme.title: The Tenor - Lirico Spinto
programme.desc: A strong partnership and friendship begins when a talented Korean vocalist met a Japanese music producer. At the peak of his career, he was diagnosed with thyroid cancer and might loss his voice...

programme.title: Go Go 70S

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep885886
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45344535
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1978
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3531
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45364537
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1980
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3533
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2542
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: iWalker-West Eyes to the East (M) Ep372
programme.desc: "iWalker - West Eyes to the East" followed the host, Rifat who is a foreigner that traveled abroad, leading the audience to experience Taiwan, which has never been seen before.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep889890
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45374538

On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1775
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1004
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Before he became the great Khan he was known as Temüjin, and was deeply in love with his childhood sweetheart Börte. News of Temüjin's father's death disrupted their relationship and as Temüjin heads back home, he faces a sudden attack from his father's former comrades, causing his whole tribe to be destroyed.

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: In this movie directed by John Woo, lawyer Du goes on the run after he is framed for a murder. Veteran detective Yamura suspects the case to be more complicated than it seems, and while he understands Du better during the hunt, Yamura still doubts his innocence. Is the real killer lurking elsewhere? Is there a hidden conspiracy behind the murder?

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kong’s neon nights. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Mrs K is a housewife living with her family. When a stranger uses her dark history to blackmail her, Mrs K is forced to face an old enemy to save her family.

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student defect a cunning, malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the family business, over the game of mahjong.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Daily’s Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score…

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other’s parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents’ first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: The Cheng family embodies a microcosm of Hong Kong, with its contradictions between tradition and modernity, superstition and materialism, family and individual. The movie reveals troubled characters dealing with their own issues in the city, from the eldest, Taoist priest patriarch Dong; to the youngest, the bullied elementary schooler Chloe.

programme.title: Hello Mr. Billionaire
programme.desc: An incompetent soccer goalkeeper for a minor league suddenly inherits thirty billion yuan in this mind-boggling comedy. In order to get the full amount, he must first spend one billion yuan on himself in a month without telling anyone about the task, and is also not allowed to own any assets at the end of it.

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Based on real events, the movie follows the footsteps of the fans of Hong Kong Canto-pop diva Anita Mui. After the death of the popstar, fans from different walks of life risk arrest to track down handwritten cards, letters and other possessions from Anita Mui to preserve their idol’s memory.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard who is suffering from early stages of dementia befriends a young girl whose life is threatened when her father falls in with the international crime world. The girl disappeared one day, and the bodyguard vows to save the life of his young friend.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: The Bullet Vanishes
programme.desc: A murder case which the bullet seems to disappear. A detective and his partner start the investigation that revolves around the questions of “Is shooting without bullets possible? How can a bullet disappear upon contact with a body?”

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung is a fearless fighter who aligns himself with one of the two gang leaders ruling Guangzhou. However, there is more to the young Wong Fei Hung than meets the eye as he has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Roger’s family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: Wallace, an old gang member, is tasked to kill the son of a mob boss, Robert. Gathering his team for the job, the six of them set out to hunt Robert down. However, when the mission goes horribly wrong, Wallace later finds out that it was all a set-up to flush out a mole in his team…

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of “The Way We Dance” features the plight of Hong Kong’s grassroots performing artists as they fight against the government’s plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Monster Hunt
programme.desc: The pregnant queen of the monster realm flees a civil war and lands in human world, near Yung Ning Village. She seeks the help of a wimpy villager to become the surrogate father for her child, Wuba. From the time he was born, little Wuba embarks on a thrilling journey to escape from those who want to capture him at all costs.

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963, and ruthlessly carved an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: New Tales Of The Flying Fox
programme.desc: In a great rendition of The Silver Fox and Legend of the Fox comes this exciting adventure, where the only thing between the clan leaders and certain death is Hui Ying-hung.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor’s sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world. However, she is caught between both men whom she admires when facing a deadly duel.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy “House of 72 tenants”, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern – an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all…

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Li Ching plays, Ah Chiao, a girl from a rural village stranded in the city, who befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are all poor, but Ah Chiao’s fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she ultimately learns money can't buy happiness.

programme.title: The Emperor And His Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlong’s younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles…

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fiancé Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan…

programme.title: Pursuit Of Vengeance
programme.desc: Kung Fu legend Ti Lung stars in the action movie as Fu Xue Hong, embarking on a epic journey of revenge for his father.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, however, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf for winning the lantern contest. At the same time, Zhao plans for revenge. One day, after Long’s wife suddenly disappeared, Long hears about the story of human lantern, leading him to suspect Zhao may involve in the incident…

programme.title: The Young Avenger
programme.desc: Liu seeks out Li to avenge his brother’s death and loses an arm in the fight, vowing revenge ten years later. Li dies after asking his sister to send his daughter Bao Zhu to learn the Dragon Sword skill to avenge his death. Bao Zhu grows up to become a skilled swordswoman and meets Liu for the planned duel with her cousin Chen. Can she defeat Liu?

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: Holy Flame Of The Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: A Place To Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: The Jade Raksha
programme.desc: A fearsome swordswoman known as The Jade Raksha appears in the martial arts world and begins killing people whose surname is Yan. A swordsman figures out who she is and asks her why. Apparently a Yan killed her family 18 years ago and she only has vengeance on her mind…

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister’s wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: The Qing government assigns fighters to destroy Shaolin Temple and kill all the disciples, but two of them successfully escaped. They train under different masters and learn the Wing Chun and Hung Quan styles respectively, finally killing the fighters and taking revenge for the death of their fellow disciples.

programme.title: Clans Of Intrigue
programme.desc: One day, when the heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, Gong from the Holy Water Palace accuses Chu of stealing the holy water and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove him innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case…

programme.title: The Reckless Cricket
programme.desc: Inspired by “Drunken Master”, this kung fu comedy features a bumbling martial artist creating a cricket-style fighting arts to fight and defeat the different martial artists who have beaten him before.

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the men’s help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium house’s owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor’s death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: House Of Traps
programme.desc: It all started with THE FIVE VENOMS, the internationally loved kung-fu thriller which introduced director Chang Cheh's recurring cast of martial arts masters. It continued through more than a dozen high-flying, bloody good entertainments featuring the same action actors in pairs, trios, quartets, and, most memorably, quintets. While this is considered the last official "Venoms" movie, what a film it is. The title does not lie: an evil prince has secreted stolen imperial treasures in a building that practically bristles with booby-trapped blades. Bodies are pierced, limbs are cut off, and there's one plasma-spurting attack after another as heroes and rogues alike try to solve the secrets of the hell house. The core Venoms themselves choreograph the gory fun in this fond farewell to their worldwide film series sensation.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: Lady Of The Law
programme.desc: Chan, the chief of Wan Sheng Escort, is forced to raise his opponent’s son, Yim. While Chan forbids Yim to practice martial arts, Yim secretly learns it. Ten years later, a rapist appears and Yim is arrested by a lady constable as the suspect. The rapist turns out to be Chan’s elder son and Yim is framed by the Chans. Can Yim prove his innocence?

programme.title: Beyond The Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun’s warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huang’s father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: Dangal
programme.desc: After his failure at winning a gold medal for the country, Mahavir Phogat vows to realise his dreams by training his daughters for the Commonwealth Games despite societal pressures.

programme.title: Mannar Vagereya
programme.desc: Madhi helps his brother Arivu unite with the love of his life, which causes trouble between the families. When Madhi tells his parents about the woman he loves, they disapprove of his relationship.

programme.title: Marainthirunthu Paarkum Marmam Enna
programme.desc: A group of chain snatchers hatch an elaborate plan to carry out their operation. They target women and children but must ensure that they do not get caught.

programme.title: Nota
programme.desc: A bachelor who is unaware of the political world is appointed a Chief Minister when his corrupt father retires.

programme.title: Uriyadi 2
programme.desc: Lenin Vijay, a young man, secures a job at a factory, along with two other friends. However, when he learns that the place is flouting environmental norms and causing deaths, he seeks justice.

programme.title: Bow Bow
programme.desc: Sanju, a little boy, adopts different methods to train his lazy dog. His world, however, comes crashing down when he loses the dog.

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: Following an accident, a young man gets a major surgery performed on his face. However, when he realises that a lot of people are after his life, he decides to find out why.

programme.title: Ismart Shankar
programme.desc: Shankar, a contract killer, manages to escape after murdering a politician. Later, he helps the police find a murderer when an officer's memory is transferred to him.

programme.title: God Father
programme.desc: A political leader's death leads to a power struggle. Amid corruption, greed and deceit, an unlikely opponent steps up.

programme.title: Samar
programme.desc: Shankar and Roopa fall in love with each other but she suddenly ends their relationship and moves out of the country. Shankar receives a mysterious invitation from Roopa to come to Bangkok.

programme.title: Kaadaan
programme.desc: The bond between humans and elephants with Bandevs story as he fights for the protection of his ele-friends.

programme.title: Thumbaa
programme.desc: Hari and Umapathy, two painters, meet Varsha, a wildlife photographer, while working in a forest. Soon, they team up to stop a corrupt officer from capturing a tiger, Thumbaa.

programme.title: Krack (Ravi Teja)
programme.desc: When three notorious criminals lock horns with a hot-tempered police officer, Potharaju Shankar, little do they know that they will end up behind bars.

programme.title: Vaa Arugil Vaa
programme.desc: An unlucky young woman is married off to a man who thinks she is from a rich family. The groom's family tries everything to throw her out of the house.
Dr.Vaseegaran is forced to reassemble Chitti in order to stop a deadly winged monster.

programme.title: Radhe Shyam
programme.desc: World-renowned palmist Vikramaditya falls head over heels in love with doctor Prerana on a train journey. However, the lovers must rewrite their destiny and even cheat death to be together.

programme.title: Kho Kho
programme.desc: Maria, a physical education teacher, takes up the chance to train the school's promising girls' team in the sport of kho-kho. While doing so, she aspires to accomplish her own unfulfilled dream.

programme.title: Sindhubadh
programme.desc: Thiru, a crook, falls in love with Venba and marries her before she goes to Malaysia. However, everything turns upside down when her father sells her for the skin trade.

programme.title: Kaaviya Thalaivan
programme.desc: Two rival artists at Sivadas Swamigal's drama troupe compete in everything they do. While one of them goes on to become successful, the other fails in life.

programme.title: Lockup
programme.desc: Ilavarasi, a police inspector, sets out to investigate the murder of a fellow colleague. However, the evidence appears to be fabricated and suggests involvement of someone from her own department

programme.title: Street Fighter (Thallumalla)
programme.desc: A young, carefree man who's drawn into fights falls in love with a star vlogger, where the impact of his fists could have disastrous effects on his blossoming relationship.

programme.title: LIE

programme.title: Scream 2
programme.desc: While away at college, Sidney Prescott thought she'd finally put the terror behind her, until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel in which no one is safe, or beyond suspicion.

programme.title: Domingo
programme.desc: The historic election of Brazilian president Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva is seen from the perspective of a provincial bourgeois family. His inauguration deeply troubles the family, as they worry about their authority and wealth in this new administration.

programme.title: Clay Pit
programme.desc: It’s the 90s in Russia. Mila has returned home to a remote Russian town after failing to “make it in Moscow” while her sister is about to wed Rustam, a charming young man. But when Rustam becomes the centre of conflicting passions, terrible chaos ensues.

programme.title: In The Heart Of The World
programme.desc: In a poor Brazilian neighbourhood, its many inhabitants struggle to make ends meet. Everyone yearns for a happier future where life isn’t only about unforgiving survival – petty crime, big crime, anything that pays becomes a pathway of hope.

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: Four couples experience the ups and downs of pregnancy. In an IVF clinic, there’s been a mix-up between 2 couples while the owners realise they’re going to be parents again in their 40s. Meanwhile, Liane wants a baby but her partner is commitment-phobic.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: DNA Episode 5
programme.desc: Investigations take a sinister turn when further investigations points Rolf to a monastery in Southern Poland. He soon realises that he’s possibly looking at a complex international child trafficking network, where religion is far from virtuous.

programme.title: DNA Episode 6
programme.desc: Rolf discovers that the monastery illegally supplies babies to an online organisation called “Bliss”. He travels to Paris to investigate a celebrity couple who he suspects have used “Bliss” and soon find revealing connections to his daughter and Minna’s cases.

programme.title: Golden Men
programme.desc: Based on a true story. A star-studded heist film with a comedic edge, Golden Men follows a group of desperate men in Turin who attempt an armoured truck robbery.

programme.title: Super Kipli
programme.desc: Zilkifli needs to pay for the security deposit for a job he so desperately needs. To do so, he borrows a car to open a passenger shuttle route. However, he faces many setbacks and complications in his effort to do so.

programme.title: Discovering Mandy
programme.desc: Hot young designer, Mia, is a lowly dressmaker’s daughter who has worked hard to succeed in the cutthroat fashion world. However, her world crashes when her famous mentor abandons her suddenly and she is Mandy again, being forced to return to her roots.

programme.title: Kuma
programme.desc: After being tricked into becoming the second wife of a Turkish man in Vienna, the naïve Ayse accepts her fate and even develops a close friendship with Fatma, the first wife. With Fatma dying of cancer, Ayse has to take over her marital duties.

programme.title: Domingo
programme.desc: The historic election of Brazilian president Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva is seen from the perspective of a provincial bourgeois family. His inauguration deeply troubles the family, as they worry about their authority and wealth in this new administration.

programme.title: In The Heart Of The World
programme.desc: In a poor Brazilian neighbourhood, its many inhabitants struggle to make ends meet. Everyone yearns for a happier future where life isn’t only about unforgiving survival – petty crime, big crime, anything that pays becomes a pathway of hope.

programme.title: DNA Episode 5
programme.desc: Investigations take a sinister turn when further investigations points Rolf to a monastery in Southern Poland. He soon realises that he’s possibly looking at a complex international child trafficking network, where religion is far from virtuous.

programme.title: DNA Episode 6
programme.desc: Rolf discovers that the monastery illegally supplies babies to an online organisation called “Bliss”. He travels to Paris to investigate a celebrity couple who he suspects have used “Bliss” and soon find revealing connections to his daughter and Minna’s cases.

programme.title: Murders In Brouage
programme.desc: A young majorette is found murdered near the property of a Chinese wine grower. Although the case appears straightforward, Gendarme captain Claire soon uncovers a complicated web of xenophobia, family troubles and dirty small-town politics.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: H Is For Happiness
programme.desc: In this quirky coming-of-age dramedy, Candice is a twelve year old girl with boundless optimism and happiness. Set in the quirky town of Albany, she sets out to conquer the trials of adolescence and bring love back into her broken family.

programme.title: Golden Men
programme.desc: Based on a true story. A star-studded heist film with a comedic edge, Golden Men follows a group of desperate men in Turin who attempt an armoured truck robbery.

programme.title: My Father's Bike
programme.desc: When Włodek’s wife suddenly leaves him for another man, the 70-year-old man has a heart attack. His son and grandson visit him, and the inter-generational trio embarks on a long journey to find her. They address past grievances and create new memories.

programme.title: Super Kipli
programme.desc: Zilkifli needs to pay for the security deposit for a job he so desperately needs. To do so, he borrows a car to open a passenger shuttle route. However, he faces many setbacks and complications in his effort to do so.

programme.title: Discovering Mandy
programme.desc: Hot young designer, Mia, is a lowly dressmaker’s daughter who has worked hard to succeed in the cutthroat fashion world. However, her world crashes when her famous mentor abandons her suddenly and she is Mandy again, being forced to return to her roots.

programme.title: Her Job
programme.desc: In this slow-burning film about sexism and female emancipation, Panayiota is an illiterate housewife who gets her first job as a cleaner. Over time, she rises up the ranks and gains her family respect; but danger looms as a series of layoffs start.

programme.title: DNA Episode 7
programme.desc: Further clues bring Rolf and his team to Denmark where they investigate a seemingly respectable pair of foster parents. They discover a murky undercurrent of illegal child trafficking activities that connects them back to a mole in their own police team.

programme.title: DNA Episode 8
programme.desc: With the international child trafficking ring exposed, the Minna case is finally solved. However, Rolf’s mission isn’t complete - he painstakingly continues to search for his daughter and finds himself on a circular path that’s linked to Minna’s case.

programme.title: Who Framed Santa Claus?
programme.desc: Wonderfast, a highly successful online delivery company, enjoys great business all year around except during Christmas. Despite attempts to sabotage Santa Claus, their efforts produce unexpected results. Will the Christmas spirit prevail after all?

programme.title: Kuessipan
programme.desc: Growing up together as best friends in an Innu community, Shaniss and Mikuan’s friendship is put to the test when Mikuan falls in love with a white boy and dreams of leaving the reserve they grew up in.

programme.title: Murders In Brouage
programme.desc: A young majorette is found murdered near the property of a Chinese wine grower. Although the case appears straightforward, Gendarme captain Claire soon uncovers a complicated web of xenophobia, family troubles and dirty small-town politics.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Till Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Two commissioners, Hannah Zeiler and Micha Oberländer, investigate a traditional bride kidnapping-turned-brutal murder. As the investigation unfolds, the commissioners uncover an old family tragedy.

programme.title: Her Job
programme.desc: In this slow-burning film about sexism and female emancipation, Panayiota is an illiterate housewife who gets her first job as a cleaner. Over time, she rises up the ranks and gains her family respect; but danger looms as a series of layoffs start.

programme.title: The Etruscan Smile
programme.desc: Neil is a rugged and hostile Scotsman who enjoys solitary life. When he’s forced to seek medical treatment in America, he begrudgingly moves in with his son who tries to connect with him. Yet, it is his grandson who ultimately stirs his hardened heart.

programme.title: Who Framed Santa Claus?
programme.desc: Wonderfast, a highly successful online delivery company, enjoys great business all year around except during Christmas. Despite attempts to sabotage Santa Claus, their efforts produce unexpected results. Will the Christmas spirit prevail after all?

programme.title: The Winner And I
programme.desc: Carolin is a geriatric nurse and single mother who is stuck with heavy debt. When she finds a 5 million winning lottery ticket, her honest nature prompts her to find its owner. However, things get tricky when the whole town finds out about her “win”.

programme.title: Kuessipan
programme.desc: Growing up together as best friends in an Innu community, Shaniss and Mikuan’s friendship is put to the test when Mikuan falls in love with a white boy and dreams of leaving the reserve they grew up in.

programme.title: International Falls
programme.desc: Dee is a middle-aged mother of two who is stuck in a Midwest rut. While on vacation, she meets Tim, a washed-up stand-up comedian, and an unlikely bond develops. Together, they find the silver lining in their gloomy lives.

programme.title: Take It Or Leave It
programme.desc: 30-year-old construction worker Erik suddenly finds himself a single parent when his ex-girlfriend, whom he hasn’t seen for six months, has a baby girl and informs him that she’ll put the child up for adoption unless he wants to take care of his daughter.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Golden Fish
programme.desc: A popular Physics teacher is found dead following an experiment gone wrong. Could his death merely be an accident or could it have been a result of foul play? Things become more complicated when a rumour of a teacher-student affair surfaces.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S1 10
programme.desc: Lana reaches out to Lois and Clark when Kyle starts behaving strangely. Meanwhile, Jonathan opens up to Jordan. Lastly, Sarah storms out after accusing her mom of always covering for her dad.

programme.title: Gotham S1 1
programme.desc: In the series premiere, GOTHAM follows Jim Gordon as he navigates a dangerously corrupt city, and chronicles the birth of one of the most popular super heroes of our time.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 12
programme.desc: When the guys finally agree to do something the girls like, it leads to a confrontation between Leonard and Sheldon.

programme.title: Friends S4 12
programme.desc: Phoebe finds out whether she is pregnant or not. A simple challenge escalates into a full-blown contest between the guys and the women.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S5 11
programme.desc: Everyone is eager to use the Loom of Fate, but the team must decide who they want to bring back first, leaving Charlie to make a tough choice.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 4
programme.desc: Our buyers throw down to score a locker packed with rare movie memorabilia. Then, Papa Bear and T-Money each scoop up low-grade bins, but when they each start to sift through their individual messes, one of them finds a childhood dream-come-true. Andlater, the day's final auction sparks an intense bidding war, but when one of our buyers shoots the moon on his bid, it leaves everyone else wondering exactly where all of this cash is coming from.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 13
programme.desc: While working in a cheese store, Michael milks the reaction of a woman stunned by breeding brie. Later, Michael nails down the perfect app in a salon and unpacks a trick in an airport that ruffles his assistant's feathers.

programme.title: Blindspot S5 8
programme.desc: As Madeline and Ivy (Julee Cerda) close in on the location of the bunker, the team realizes that someone on the inside is feeding information to Madeline.

programme.title: DC's Stargirl S2 9
programme.desc: As Eclipso takes aim, Pat is reminded of painful memories from his past with the original JSA and their fight to take down Eclipso. JOHN WESLEY SHIPP guest stars as Jay Garrick.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 2
programme.desc: Veronica and Wallace don't believe in the evidence against Weevil, who has been arrested for stealing credit card applications from Logan's family, and launch an investigation to help their new ally. Meanwhile, after joining Ms. Mallory Dent's (series star SYDNEY TAMIIA POITIER) journalism class, Veronica clashes with socialite Caitlin Ford (PARIS HILTON - "The Simple Life 2"), Logan's sexy new girlfriend. The young investigator is intrigued by the attention shown to her by another wealthy student, Troy Vandegraff (recurring guest star AARON ASHMORE), a friend of her ex-boyfriend Duncan. Later, Veronica learns that Lilly got a ticket while driving her car on the day she died--two hours after her supposed time of death.

programme.title: Rizzoli & Isles S1 3
programme.desc: Jane and Maura investigate the death of a young Cape Verdean boy who may have died during an attempted exorcism. Plus, Jane's mother sets her up on a surprise date.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 3
programme.desc: With only a commonplace name, an old address and dim memories as leads, Veronica and Wallace attempt to help classmate Justin Smith (BOBBY EDNER) find his father, who disappeared 10 years earlier. Meanwhile, as Veronica experiences some complicatedfeelings towards ex-boyfriend Duncan and new romantic interest Troy (recurring guest star AARON ASHMORE), guidance counselor Rebecca James (PAULA MARSHALL) calls Keith to the school to discuss the recent, dramatic changes in his daughter's life. Later, Duncan struggles with ways to cope with his sister's death as the anniversary of her murder approaches.

programme.desc: After a student is gunned down in broad daylight, the investigation reveals she had more than a few secrets. Meanwhile, Jane's mother and father get into a spat.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 4
programme.desc: In an effort to help Wallace's new friend, Georgia (KYLA PRATT), who was duped out of her money in an Internet scheme, Veronica must outwit a group of computer "thugs," known as the Silicon Mafia. Meanwhile, Keith makes Veronica introduce him to her new boyfriend, Troy (recurring guest star AARON ASHMORE), before allowing her to go to the homecoming dance with him. Later, Logan helps Duncan edit together a memorial video for a school dedication ceremony marking the one-year anniversary of Lilly's death.

And later, the day's final auction reveals contents so shocking our buyers may be shut out of this game completely.

We've got a belt for your booty, a robot that pours beer and an exciting new way to enjoy butter. Act now and we'll throw in our one of a kind cast, includingTodd Bridges, Jaimie Andrews, Brendon Walsh and John Enos.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 14
programme.desc: When an online bully destroys Leonard and Sheldon's physics paper, the guys band together to take him down.

programme.title: Friends S4 14
programme.desc: Joey has no time to shower after he comes home from a three-day fishing trip and has to head out to the set of Charlton Heston's new movie.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S5 13
programme.desc: After drinking from the Chalice, the Legends have immortality for 24 hours, but find themselves trapped in a zombie apocalypse, while the sisters steal the Waverider.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 6
programme.desc: Minds are blown when two of our buyers team up for a major score. It's an unlikely pair that, together, could make a pile of cash. Plus, Jesse takes a big gamble on some African art and sweats it out hard when the authenticity is questioned. And later, the day's final auction reveals contents so shocking our buyers may be shut out of this game completely.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 15
programme.desc: At an appliance store, a man goes bananas over Michael's self-stocking fridge. Then, Michael speeds up the life cycle of a frog in a science lab, and he pulls the strings at an estate sale when a haunted doll toys with his assistant.

programme.title: Blindspot S5 10
programme.desc: As Ivy races to retrieve the devastating stash of ZIP bombs, the remaining members of the team must rely on the help of a longtime thorn in their side - the very unstable genius Kathy Gustafson.

programme.title: DC's Stargirl S2 11
programme.desc: After a frightening encounter leaves Courtney’s life hanging in the balance, the team band together to determine their next steps.

programme.title: Rizzoli & Isles S1 4
programme.desc: After a student is gunned down in broad daylight, the investigation reveals she had more than a few secrets. Meanwhile, Jane's mother and father get into a spat.

programme.desc: Sheldon’s database invention puts him at odds with the university. Also, the church takes issue with Meemaw’s video store.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S6 9
programme.desc: Sheldon considers dropping out of college to focus on building his database. Also, George Sr. is frustrated when someone else gets credit for his football wins.

programme.title: Cop Out
programme.desc: Bruce Willis and 30 Rock's Tracy Morgan star as two longtime NYPD partners on the trail of a stolen, rare, mint-condition baseball card in the first major studio project from cult independent filmmaker Kevin Smith (Clerks, Chasing Amy). Willis plays the veteran detective whose missing collectible is his only hope to pay for his daughter's upcoming wedding, and Morgan is his "partner-against-crime." The two cops find themselves tangling with a merciless, memorabilia-obsessed gangster, rescuing a Mexican beauty with the key to millions in laundered drug money, and everything else that's not in a day's work for the detective duo.

programme.title: CSI: Miami (Season 10) Ep5
programme.desc: Killer Regrets - Horatio protects a Mexican police chief from the mysterious assassin who killed her husband.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (Season 11) Ep6

programme.title: CSI: NY (Season 7) Ep6
programme.desc: Do Not Pass Go - When a badly decomposed body is found in an abandoned car on a rooftop, Mac and his team must go up against a killer who is using the parents of his victims to manipulate crime scenes.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep184
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.title: The Mask Of Zorro
programme.desc: A young thief seeking revenge for his brother's death is trained by the once-great, aging Zorro, who is pursuing his own vengeance.

programme.title: Bokeh
programme.desc: On a romantic getaway to Iceland, a young American couple wake up one morning to discover every person on earth has disappeared. Their struggle to survive the mysterious event lead them to reconsider everything.

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Kingdom Of The Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Famed archaeologist/adventurer Dr. Henry 'Indiana' Jones is called back into action when he becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Last Crusade
programme.desc: After settling down to a quieter life, Indy is thrust back into action when his father mysteriously disappears while on a quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Battle In Seattle
programme.desc: Seattle broke into a full-scale state of emergency as thousands of protestors gathered in resistance to the World Trade Organization. The lives of the city’s mayor, a SWAT cop on the streets and his pregnant wife, and four demonstrators intersect in the ensuing riots.

programme.title: An Imperfect Murder
programme.desc: An actress's nightmare about killing her ex-boyfriend somehow becomes a reality.

programme.title: Sliver
programme.desc: A literary agent's life seems to take a turn for the better when she moves into a new apartment and develops a romance but as the history of the building and its occupants unfolds, she is plunged into a terrifying nightmare of high-tech voyeurism and murder.

programme.title: Stray
programme.desc: An orphaned teenager forms an unlikely friendship with a detective. Together they investigate her mother's murder, and uncover the supernatural force that proves to be a threat to her family.

programme.title: Steel Sharks
programme.desc: In this undersea thriller, a United States chemist is captured by terrorists. But a rescue attempt by an elite group of Navy Seals goes wrong when they are captured. Now they must wage a silent war beneath the waves.

programme.title: One Point O
programme.desc: After receiving mysterious empty packages inside his apartment, a young computer-programmer begins a personal investigation into their origins.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: In this wild action adventure, Axel Foley discovers that mobsters are using a theme park as a front for their money-counterfeiting operation, and defeats the evil scheme while turning the park upside down.

programme.title: Steel Sharks
programme.desc: In this undersea thriller, a United States chemist is captured by terrorists. But a rescue attempt by an elite group of Navy Seals goes wrong when they are captured. Now they must wage a silent war beneath the waves.

programme.title: Sliver

programme.title: Stray
programme.desc: An orphaned teenager forms an unlikely friendship with a detective. Together they investigate her mother's murder, and uncover the supernatural force that proves to be a threat to her family.

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: After an accident at a nearby oil-drilling site displaces a strange and subterranean creature with a taste and a talent for speed, Tripp may have just found the key to getting out of town and a most unlikely friend.

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Kingdom Of The Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Famed archaeologist/adventurer Dr. Henry 'Indiana' Jones is called back into action when he becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep1
programme.desc: We follow the people of China from January to April as the Chinese concept of 24 solar terms is explained. After Chinese New Year we witness a stunning Lantern Festival in Nanjing.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Australia - Ben Fogle reunites with a couple living off the west coast of Australia, and discovers the logistical nightmares they have overcome to make a home for themselves on a desert island, as well as enduring the extremes of the Australian climate. While they have recently had cause to celebrate, their lives are becoming increasingly difficult, which may result in them moving on.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep17
programme.desc: A look at production in food factories including hamburger patties, ribbon candy, and Mexican chocolate discs.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep18
programme.desc: A look at how some foods are made in food factories including root beer, mini chocolate cakes and tamari soy sauce.

programme.title: Wild Japan S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Southwest Islands - Stories of isolation, unique wildlife and unsolved mysteries surround a chain of Japanese islands which stretch towards the tropics - where all life is influenced by the power of the sea.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ancestors - Michael Wood joins the Qin family reunion, when 300 relatives gather to worship their ancestors on Tomb Sweeping Day, before visiting some excavations at Erlitou.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep1

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep19
programme.desc: 50 million Big Hunks of peanutty nougat are produced every year; watch potato pellets become Smart Fries in just two minutes flat; and see how one million gummy bears are produced every hour.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep20
programme.desc: A mesmerising behind-the-scenes peek into the mega-industrial production lines of food factories, including pretzel nuggets, French fried onions and Italian Brio soda.

programme.title: Animals with Cameras S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Australia - Wildlife cameraman, Gordon Buchanan leads a team using specially designed on board cameras to film ground-breaking new behaviour in some of Australia's most iconic creatures.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Silk Roads and China Ships - In the backstreets and markets of Xi'an, Michael meets descendants of the traders from central Asia and Persia who came into China on the Silk Road.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Discover the secrets of the New York skyscraper that defies the laws of physics to stay standing; and the thousand foot elevator built on the side of a Chinese mountain.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Europe - Robson travels Spain, Portugal and the Canary Islands in search of the highly prized blue marlin. He also eats the poisonous escolar fish.

programme.title: Chinese New Year: The Biggest Celebration on Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Migration - At the Harbin Ice and Snow Festival, the Chinese brave the cold, dive into frozen water and enjoy themselves at minus 30 degrees as they celebrate the New Year in an icy wonderland.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Last Breath - Unable to breathe, Cyril is trapped underwater while on a mission to catch huge flat-headed beasts hiding in the murky snake and alligator-infested rivers of Texas and Mississippi. The only way to get to the 70lb flatheads is to go 30 feet deep, and catch them with his bare hands.

programme.desc: British Columbia, Canada - Robson heads out on the Fraser River to find Canada's largest game fish; the mighty sturgeon, which can reach weights of 1000 lbs and lengths of 12ft.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep23
programme.desc: A look at how some foods are made in food factories. This episode looks at factories producing cola, pickled beetroot, swiss rolls and yoghurt.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep24
programme.desc: See billions of Sixlets candies, or the 40,000 heads of cabbage to make 400,000 Zarky's cabbage rolls. Plus American Farmer sweet and salty popcorn is popped, and TGI Friday and Indenture Foods potato skins chips look deli fresh.

programme.title: Wild Thailand S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Tropical South - Southern Thailand is known for its spectacular natural beauty and wild parties, but behind the familiar tourist trails it's also a place where spirituality permeates every part of life.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Arriving late at night in bustling downtown Seoul, Alexander kicks off his epic Korean adventure in Gangnam, the fabled district immortalised by Psy's Gangnam Style video - the most viewed song on YouTube.

programme.title: Robson and Jim's Icelandic Fly Fishing Adventure S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Actors Robson Green and Jim Murray are in Iceland on the fishing trip of a lifetime. Their journey starts at the airport - and continues around the island.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Alaska - Robson heads north to Alaska for extreme temperatures and extreme fish, including northern pike, king salmon, cod, chinook salmon and rainbow trout.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 - Iceland: Ice Ep2
programme.desc: Tour an island built by volcanoes, but sculpted by ice. About 1.5 million years ago, a sheet of ice descended from the north and covered the land. Today, massive glaciers continue to carve marine cliffs and cut down mountains.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Praying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenix’s search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Alhambra Ep4
programme.desc: Tour the marvelous Alhambra, a must-see fortress in Spain's Grenada region. Today this world heritage site acts as a refuge for the region’s wildlife. With its many streams and fountains, Alhambra serves amphibian, fish, and bird alike.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Neuschwanstein Ep5
programme.desc: Learn how one of the world's most spectacular structures, Neuschwanstein castle, and its surrounding forests have become home base for many creatures. From the Alpine ibex to the majestic swans, this castle has been a natural haven for centuries.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 5 Ep5
programme.desc: A curious raccoon sticks his head a little too far into a peanut butter jar on a sweltering summer day in Toronto. See how the team gets him out of this sticky situation. Then cheer on a painted turtle who needs emergency eye surgery.

programme.title: Rooted 1 - Sweet Seduction Ep2
programme.desc: Discover the story of the much loved Sausage Tree, whose nectar filled blooms and sausage shaped fruits entice animals of all kinds, from insects to elephants. See how the very animals who rely on this generous tree ensure its proliferation.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 - Iceland: Fire Ep1
programme.desc: Learn about the world’s largest volcanic island, a lone and rugged place where steam escapes, water explodes, and new ground is born every day. See how fire and ice collide in a battle that makes this the most geologically powerful island on earth.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 - Iceland: Ice Ep2
programme.desc: Tour an island built by volcanoes, but sculpted by ice. About 1.5 million years ago, a sheet of ice descended from the north and covered the land. Today, massive glaciers continue to carve marine cliffs and cut down mountains.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenix’s search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Neuschwanstein Ep5
