programme.title: Rooted 1 - Sweet Seduction Ep2
programme.desc: Discover the story of the much loved Sausage Tree, whose nectar filled blooms and sausage shaped fruits entice animals of all kinds, from insects to elephants. See how the very animals who rely on this generous tree ensure its proliferation.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - Warriors of the Llanos Ep3
programme.desc: The flat savannas of the Colombian Llanos are governed by seasonal extremes that push life to the brink. In this unforgiving arena, there are no second chances, and only creatures best adapted to their brutal extremes will make it through a year.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 6 Ep6
programme.desc: Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 - Iceland: Fire Ep1
programme.desc: Learn about the world’s largest volcanic island, a lone and rugged place where steam escapes, water explodes, and new ground is born every day. See how fire and ice collide in a battle that makes this the most geologically powerful island on earth.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 - Iceland: Ice Ep2
programme.desc: Tour an island built by volcanoes, but sculpted by ice. About 1.5 million years ago, a sheet of ice descended from the north and covered the land. Today, massive glaciers continue to carve marine cliffs and cut down mountains.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Praying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenix’s search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Alhambra Ep4
programme.desc: Tour the marvelous Alhambra, a must-see fortress in Spain's Grenada region. Today this world heritage site acts as a refuge for the region’s wildlife. With its many streams and fountains, Alhambra serves amphibian, fish, and bird alike.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Neuschwanstein Ep5
programme.desc: Learn how one of the world's most spectacular structures, Neuschwanstein castle, and its surrounding forests have become home base for many creatures. From the Alpine ibex to the majestic swans, this castle has been a natural haven for centuries.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 7 Ep7
programme.desc: Follow along as the wildlife rehab team works to treat a baby raccoon, separated from his family, and get him back in the wild before his parents move on. In another part of the center, watch as an orphaned killdeer is introduced to...himself?

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 8 Ep8
programme.desc: Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the center, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.title: Rooted 1 - The Giant Ep3
programme.desc: In a misty South African forest grows a six hundred year old Outeniqua Yellowwood. At forty meters tall, she towers above the canopy and is one of the few remaining of her kind. Follow her captivating story, unique as the ecosystem in her branches.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - Finding a Family Ep4
programme.desc: Mona, a female cotton top tamarin is all alone in her tropical forest home. She has left the security of her birth family to search for an unrelated troop which might provide her with a future mate.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Alhambra Ep4

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep10
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Banner - The banner for Revs' Air show has disappeared. Where can it be ? Could someone be trying to spoil Revs' show? Noddy investigates.

programme.desc: The Case Of The Fallen Star - When the brightest star in the sky falls, Noddy has to find it and work out how to get it back into its place in the sky before its light goes out forever. Will he manage in time for the fairies Sparkle party ?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep12
programme.desc: The Case Of The Annoying Butterflies - A strange new kind of butterfly is pestering the toys in Toyland – just when the Queen organises a butterfly ball. Noddy has to find out what's going on fast !

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep9
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Noisy Present - Raa Raa has made his friend Topsy a wonderful present - a noisy set of chimes. But she doesn't want them. Who else in the jungle might like a very noisy set of wind chimes?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep10
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Big Roar - Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. The other jungle inhabitants are less amused, they only come because there are worried about their friend. What is Raa Raa to do when he gets into trouble and nobody comes to his rescue?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep11
programme.desc: Scritch Scratch - Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep12
programme.desc: Hurry Up Raa Raa - Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep9
programme.desc: Horse Powered Dinkie - Farmer Green tells the cars about olden days, when the only transport was horse and cart. Maxi and Drifter say they would never be seen travelling that slow… or would they?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep10
programme.desc: Fb'S Sleepover - FB is excited about his sleepover with the other cars in the workshop but when the night draws in he is unsure of his unfamiliar surroundings. Big Chris helps set him at his ease

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep11
programme.desc: Cici Spectacular - Mr Carburettor has asked CiCi to perform one of her stunts in front of a big crowd. CiCi is very nervous and Roary does his best to help his friend prepare for the event.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep12
programme.desc: Cry Cold - Big Chris is feeling ill so Marsha sends him to bed until he is better. Big Chris enjoys the attention rather too much and fails to let everyone know when he is on the mend.

programme.desc: Accidental Hero / Rich Kid Ra - Accidental Hero In order to win the Fright Stuff Award, Casper consults his uncles for scaring advice. Rich Kid Ra When Ra pulls up to Scare School in a solid gold chariot, everyone suddenly wants to be his best friend.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep6
programme.desc: Dragon Quest / Opposite Day - Dragon Quest The unlucky staff of a medieval-themed restaurant in Deedstown, get an unfriendly visit from Professor Thurdigree Burns. Opposite Day When Wolfie's experiment with moonlight goes awry, everyone but Casper turns into his or her opposite.

programme.desc: When Darkness Falls - On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the Dragon Riders discover its indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.

programme.desc: Duchess - The Duchess seeks Artephius' soul for her spell collection, and it's up to Puss to protect him. It turns out that The Duchess and Artephius have a complicated relationship.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep4
programme.desc: Empty Is The Head - Exhausted from settling his subjects' disputes, King Julien replaces himself with a dummy king so he can play hooky, unwittingly sparking a rebellion.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep4

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep4
programme.desc: Scraptors - Ty Rux leads the Dinotrux on a nighttime raid to rescue Ton-Ton who's been snatched by a pack of Scraptors and taken to their hive in Scraptor Valley.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Where There'S Smoke - After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Zooming Zipwire - Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire – the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success – even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Super Jet Boots - Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Olivia Ep7
programme.desc: Olivia And Her Alien Brother - After a trip to the planetarium, Ian's knowledge about space and his peculiar behaviour lead Olivia to believe that her brother is an alien. Olivia soon discovers his secret…he's making a special gift for his favourite sister

programme.desc: Olivia Plants A Garden - When Mrs. Hogenmuller distributes seeds for a class garden project, Olivia just can't wait for her plants to grow. But when her dog Perry digs up her little garden, Olivia discovers something even more exciting – what appears to be a dinosaur bone!

programme.desc: The Case Of The Untidy Pirates - It's Tidy Toyland Day and Noddy wants to win the Tidy Toyland Trophy. Unfortunately he's also invited the untidy Pirates round to play! Noddy has to figure out how he can play with the Pirates and win the Tidy Toyland Trophy.

programme.desc: The Case Of The Ruined Race - It's the Brickabuild Sports & Fun Day and Clockwork Mouse tells Carlton she doesn't want ANY accidents. But when the Egg & Spoon Race comes to a grinding halt, Noddy has to find out who is trying to ruin the race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep514

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep171
programme.desc: Bubu's New Blue Jeans - Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep172

programme.desc: Blue and Little Rainbow Riding Hood - Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep703
programme.desc: Pups Save an Antarctic Martian - Travelling Travis is on another great adventure when he lands in Antarctica but believes he's actually on Mars.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Were wig on the the loose / Lights Camera Action - When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue. // The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Paddington Meets Lucky - Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep608

programme.desc: Bad Hank - When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy just like Shadow.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Skaters Gonna Hate / Born to Be Mild - Ronnie Anne and her pals enlist Carlos X as their coach in a skate-off against Tony Hawk! // Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Bros in the Band / For the Record - Bobby's dream of playing in a band might finally come true, but can he hang with Par's punk pals? // Worried he's not keeping up with his cool friends, Sameer tries to break a record for some street cred.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Handle with Car / The Silver Blur - Duke gets a high tech, smart car. He and the temperamental car chase Ice Cream Truck Bandits. // The oblivious Ms. Blumfeld turns into a superhero, stopping crimes around the city, as Duke struggles with his orders to arrest her.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Sleepover / The 'B' Word - Parker has a sleepover for the first time and enlists Angus's help to make it as fun as possible. // Parker and Angus go the distance to try and give Russell a bath before her stench becomes destructive.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Game Show - Alvin signs the Chipmunks up for a game show that forces losing contestants to perform dangerous stunts.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Alvin Management - When Alvin accuses Dave of yelling at him too much a therapist moves in to help Dave control his anger.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Time Capsule - When the school digs up an old high school time capsule, Miss Smith and Dave work together to keep an old secret.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Munk Vs Machine - The Chipmunks and Chipettes compete in a dodgeball tournament but no-one expects Theo to be their secret weapon.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Krusty Kleaners - After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep103
programme.desc: Spongicus / Suctioncup Symphony - Plankton has demolished the Chum Bucket! In its place, he has built a Roman coliseum. // The Bikini Bottom Symphony is accepting submissions for their composition contest, and Squidward is determined to win.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Decoy - While out on a mission to captures three tricky tuneful Mini-Cassette Bots, Megatron and Optimus Prime have a disagreement about GHOST's treatment of Decepticons

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Valentine's Day of Horror - Nate has decided this Valentine's Day, he will finally profess his love for his dream girl in the form of a grand gesture, but the day of love quickly turns into a nightmare after Nate's "gift" gives the entire school food poisoning.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Fed Up / Shell Shock - Tired of monotonous meals, the kids make a plan to sabotage dinner so they can have pizza. // Lincoln and Ronnie Anne have to take care of an egg baby but Lincoln doesn’t trust her with the fragile egg.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Pulp Friction / Pets Peeved - Lincoln and Clyde submit an Ace Savvy comic to a meet-the-creator contest, but are foiled by a surprising nemesis. // When Lana brings home a new pet, who the kids adore, the four original Loud pets scheme to get rid of him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep146
programme.desc: The Abrasive Side / Earworm - SpongeBob can never say "no" to anyone, so he orders a product called the "abrasive side". // SpongeBob gets a song stuck in his head.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep114
programme.desc: Dear Vikings / Ditchin' - There's a new Viking-themed promotion at the Krusty Krab, so SpongeBob is determined to find out everything there is to know about Vikings. // Mermaidman and Barnacleboy are having a book signing, but SpongeBob can't go because he has boating school.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Summer Santa - When Santa shows up for summer vacation, Angus is conveniently injured and needs Santa to deliver the mail.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Worst Curse Senario - The Middlemost Post receives a mysterious trinket in the mail, which they come to believe brings bad luck.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Dog's Best Friend / Out of Shape - Angus tries to woo the only dog on the mountain that doesn't like him: Jelly. // Parker becomes overly obsessed with a game to the point where the little nimbus isn't a cloud anymore.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Zoo-mergency! - After a zoo fundraiser goes wrong, Sid must save the day with her family!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Just Be Coo / Tee'd Off - When Sancho gets himself into trouble in the city, Sergio helps him become a model pet! // Worried that Lori may have a new crush, Bobby visits her in college and tries to impress her with his golf skills.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Lalo Land / Maybe-Sitter - The Casagrandes prepare Lalo for his big audition to be Phoebe Powers' new canine sidekick! // With the adults out for the night, Bobby and Carlota take turns watching the kids - and going to a party!

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Inside Russell / The Stinkhole Chronicles - Parker must save Angus from rapidly aging inside Russell's belly. // Parker and Lily go on a quest through Old Stinkhole to rescue Angus.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow / Dentist Trip - Parker finds a body hair, and the cloud assumes it's time to become an adult! // During a trip to the dentist, Parker remembers how the S.S. Steadfast got shipwrecked on Mt. Middlemost.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep183
programme.desc: Eek, An Urchin! / Squid's Defense - SpongeBob finds a nasty sea urchin living in the Krusty Krab, and tries everything to force it out. // After getting his groceries stolen, Squidward convinces SpongeBob and Sandy to teach him karate.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep184
programme.desc: Jailbreak! / Evil Spatula - An imprisoned Plankton teams up with his fellow inmates to break out of jail and steal the Krabby Patty secret formula. // SpongeBob replaces his broken spatula with one from Plankton, which may or may not have magical powers.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep185
programme.desc: It Came From Goo Lagoon - A giant goo bubble emerges from Goo Lagoon and threatens all of Bikini Bottom--except for Plankton, who plans to use the bubble for his own evil ends.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep186
programme.desc: Safe Deposit Krabs / Plankton's Pet - Mr. Krabs gets trapped in Bikini Bottom’s brand-new bank, and it’s up to SpongeBob & Patrick to save him. // After failing again to steal the Krabby Patty formula, Plankton gets a pet to cheer himself up.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Jailhouse Panda - Po disguises himself as the merciless villain, Tong Fo, to try and locate a hidden weapon.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Big Bro Po - When Taotie tries to destroy the Jade Palace and fails, he is sent to prison while his son, Bian Zao, is left behind with Po, who acts like a big brother to the boy who thinks everything is lame!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep218
programme.desc: The Earth King - The kids battle Long Feng the Dai Li when they attempt to show the Earth King the vast conspiracy taking place in his city. Zuko becomes seriously ill and has feverish dreams as he faces a spiritual crisis.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Operation: Neighbor Swap - The penguins have had enough of the crazy lemurs 24 hour parting! They hack into the zoo habitat schematic and successfully transfer the lemurs to the petting zoo.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep314
programme.desc: The Penguin Who Loved Me - When Doris the Dolphin shows up with Parker the Platypus and asks a favor of Kowalski, he instantly jumps to her rescue only to find out it’s to free her brother Francis who happens to be a “mind-jacked” Dr. Blowhole.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Marble Jar Head / Good Night and Good Chuck - How in the world is Rico supposed to behave well when King Julien has kidnapped his doll, Miss Perky? // When the Penguins try to get the anchor man Chuck Charles back on TV they find themselves in front of the camera.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Pondgea's Got Talent / Raging Mole - When Pumpers holds a talent show, SwaySway must overcome his stage fright to perform a love song for Jenny Quackles. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce convince the Bread Maker to lose a wrestling match to Lava Mole.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep107
programme.desc: When Dragons Cry - To get the dragon's tears needed for Axe, the group must first visit a magical marketplace, where Stacey's meeting with a witch finally reveals Brendar's complicated backstory.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Dorg Wants a Laugh / Dorg Wants a Day Off - Patronella casts a spell and now one can look at Dorg without laughing! // When the gang fakes being sick for a day off, Dorg ends up in the hospital for real! He'll need to bust out and get back to school to find a cure!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Palace of the Powerless / My Fair Yeti - Felicity and Miguel attend a costume party at The Palace of the Perfect where they end up in a fight to take back some stolen powers. // Yana's invited to a fancy society event, but she's afraid she'll make a fool of herself.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Alien Craig / Googas - When Sanjay forgets to take out the garbage, a trip to the dump turns into a journey of galactic proportions. // The kids are desperate to get the most popular toy in town, but their attempts are thwarted by an obnoxious kid.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Ollie Dogs / Camp Magna - Ollie offers a monster realm condiment for his hot dog stand, accidentally causing weird side effects. // Ollie and his classmates go on a camping trip. Ollie uses the pack to avoid roughing it, attracting Andre and Bev.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Sigmund the Sorcerer / Fanboy A'hoy! - When Kyle's old rival, comes to town, he realizes the value of having friends like Fanboy and Chum Chum. // Fanboy and Chum Chum are playing pirates and decide to bury all their favorite possessions so they can then dig up the treasure.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Mission: Really Big Mission - Snaptrap wants to use T.U.F.F.’s super space laser to pop all the corn in the world’s “corn belt” and jack up the price of movie popcorn. When Dudley accidentally breaks the laser into three pieces, the race is on to get them back!

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep505

programme.title: Parkinson In Australia Ep41
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Michael Parkinson interviews guest Shane Warne.

programme.title: ABC News Summer Ep3
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We've got more reporters in more places, to tell you what's happening and why it matters.

programme.title: ABC News Video Lab Ep19
programme.desc: The ABC News Video Lab explains the events and issues making news. In this episode we examine the Hypersonic arms race, the hunt for Pluto and dealing with anxiety.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep3
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the latest news and the day's top stories, with reporters on the ground to tell you what's happening and why it matters.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep3
programme.desc: When you need to know what's happening turn to ABC News for coverage you can trust. We bring you the day's events from reporters in more locations across Australia, connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep3
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. We have reporters on the ground following the story and the issues that matter.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 8 - Back Roads host Heather Ewart takes an adventurous trip through Longford in Tasmania to find out if keeping an old world alive can still offer some surprises. (Midseason Final)

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep3
programme.desc: More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter to you. With a network of reporters across Australia and around the globe we uncover important stories and news as it unfolds.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep18
programme.desc: Concluding the story about the mysterious death of Amy Wensley. As her family fights for justice, they discover a flawed police investigation and devastating forensic oversights. (Midseason Final)

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep3
